_source.text: 2) By the force of reason, on what basis could Tyre and Sidon rise up on Judgment Day and say, "We're better than you, Chorazin and Bethsaida!, because if we were under similar circumstances, unlike you, GOD would have determined us to repent.

text: 2) By the force of reason, on what basis could Tyre and Sidon **rise** **up** on **Judgment** **Day** and say
, "We're **better** **than** you, Chorazin and Bethsaida!, because if we were under similar circumstances, unlike you, GOD would have determined us to repent.
